text: The Rutherford B. Hayes Presidential Center is a group of several buildings dedicated to President of the United States Rutherford B. Hayes. It is in Fremont, Ohio. It was started in 1916. The Rutherford B. Hayes Center Library was the first presidential library and one of only three for a 19th-century president. The library holds the 12,000 volume personal library of Rutherford B. Hayes. ==References== ==Other websites== * "Life Portrait of Rutherford B. Hayes", broadcast from the Rutherford B. Hayes Presidential Center from C-SPAN's American Presidents: Life Portraits Hayes Category:Rutherford B. Hayes Category:Buildings and structures in Ohio Category:1916 establishments in the United States Category:1910s establishments in Ohio
title: Rutherford B. Hayes Presidential Center
